rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;c0999385.1503">   <title>BUCNI presentations, Wednesday 11th March @ 3.30 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;c0999385.1503</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>Sorry for the double email but to stop people from emailing me about<br>this a clarification. I made a mistake in my last email. The project<br>presentation will be held tomorrow *Wednesday 11th March 3.30pm* as<br>usual in the Liz Bates room in 32 Torrington Square.<br><br>You can check the dates of the next project presentation in the BUCNI<br>calendar which you can find on the website and which you can link to<br>your Google calendar (if you have such a thing). You can also see the<br>next project presentation and a list of who will be presenting [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T10:37:21+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>D Sam Schwarzkopf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;c0999385.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;3c8a23a0.1503">   <title>BUCNI presentations, Tue 11th March @ 3.30 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;3c8a23a0.1503</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>Our next BUCNI project presentations will be held this Tuesday 11th<br>March at 3.30pm in the Liz Bates room in 32 Torrington Sq. We also<br>created a new page on the website called the BUCNI Blog on which I will<br>list the upcoming project presentations every month. Based on this you<br>may also notice if I received your emails. The link is here:<br>http://bucni.psychol.ucl.ac.uk/Blog/Default.aspx [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T17:28:35+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>D Samuel Schwarzkopf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;3c8a23a0.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;8ceabc77.1503">   <title>water cooler incident </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;8ceabc77.1503</link>   <description> Dear BUCNI community.<br><br>During a recent service it was discovered that apparently tea/milk had been poured into the drip tray of the water cooler. This led to build-up of foul-smelling stuff inside the unit - I'll spare you the details.<br><br>Our water cooler is NOT a plumbed-in unit, there is no waste-pipe, so please DO NOT use it for discarding any liquid!!! The sink in the bathroom can be used for that. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T12:40:35+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bayliss, Jeanette</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;8ceabc77.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;dda099a6.1502">   <title>Important BUCNI announcement! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;dda099a6.1502</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>We made some small but important changes to the project proposal procedure in BUCNI. The new procedures are found on the website: http://bucni.psychol.ucl.ac.uk/New_Project/index.shtml<br><br>1. Project proposals now contain a section where you briefly detail your hypotheses and predictions. If a project is exploratory this must be clearly labelled here and it should contain some details on expected results in general terms at least (the clearer your predictions, the better). [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-19T13:46:32+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>D Sam Schwarzkopf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;dda099a6.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;c28706be.1502">   <title>BUCNI safety training </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;c28706be.1502</link>   <description> A reminder that the next safety session is scheduled for Wednesday, 18th February, at noon.<br><br>Please let me know asap if you want to sign up for this 1.5hr training/refresher.<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Jeannette<br><br>To leave the list, go to http://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?SUBED1=bucni&amp;A=1.    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-12T11:13:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bayliss, Jeanette</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;c28706be.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;eec2d7f3.1502">   <title>BUCNI hourly rate </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;eec2d7f3.1502</link>   <description> &gt; Dear BUCNI community,<br>&gt;<br>&gt; After many years we are going to increase the rate for scanner use at BUCNI.<br>&gt; Let me say straight away that with all projects currently under way, or<br>&gt; projects where funding has already been granted/applied for, we will of course<br>&gt; honour the old rate!<br>&gt;<br>&gt; However, if you are submitting a new grant application or are proposing a new<br>&gt; study, the new rate is \ufffd\ufffd450 per hour. Please factor this into your scanning<br>&gt; budget for new projects from now on.<br>&gt;<br>> If you have any questions about [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-12T09:12:52+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jeannette Bayliss</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;eec2d7f3.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;74dafc94.1502">   <title>BUCNI presentations Wed 11th Feb (Addendum) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;74dafc94.1502</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>Today we will have TWO project presentations.<br><br>/Stephen Brown, Daniel Lametti, Emilia Molimpakis, Fred Dick &amp; Jeremy<br>Skipper//<br>//&quot;Dynamic reorganization of language and the brain with sentence<br>consolidation / /&quot;//<br>//<br>//Naheem Bashir, Joern Diedrichsen &amp; Peter Howell//<br>//&quot;Using tDCS to explore the neural basis of stuttering: Brain states<br>pre-, and post-tDCS training / // // // // //// // //// /&quot;/ [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-11T09:20:07+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>D Sam Schwarzkopf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;74dafc94.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;3e4a286.1502">   <title>BUCNI presentations Wed 11th Feb </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;3e4a286.1502</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>Next Wednesday, 11th Feb, we will have one project presentation:<br><br>Naheem Bashir, Joern Diedrichsen &amp; Peter Howell<br>&quot;Using tDCS to explore the neural basis of stuttering: Brain states<br>pre-, and post-tDCS training &quot;<br><br>As all the presentations for the next months (see calendar) this will be<br>at 3.30pm in the Liz Bates room at 32 Torrington Sq. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-06T14:47:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>D Samuel Schwarzkopf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;3e4a286.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;ac9b7ca0.1502">   <title>Easter holiday scanning with kids/ special populations </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;ac9b7ca0.1502</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>I wondered whether any groups want to do Easter holiday scanning with kids/ special populations?<br><br>According to the guidelines on holiday scanning (http://bucni.psychol.ucl.ac.uk/Holiday_Scanning/index.shtml\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd), priority booking is only between 10.00 - 16.00, so hopefully any groups scanning regular adults over the school holiday period can scan outside those times. Also, if there is availability one week in advance of the date, anyone can book free slots. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-03T17:41:51+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>O'Nions, Elizabeth</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;ac9b7ca0.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;ce6f2ae3.1502">   <title>Brain Anatomy Courses - May & June 2015, King's College London </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;ce6f2ae3.1502</link>   <description> Course announcement...    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-03T15:49:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Northam, Gemma</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;ce6f2ae3.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;d86fa35d.1501">   <title>temporary projector workaround (almost everything working!) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;d86fa35d.1501</link>   <description> hi all<br><br>As you know, the Extron video switch failed. We<br>have ordered a new one and it should soon be here.<br>We will repair the original one as well, so we will<br>have a backup in the future.<br><br>In the meantime, I have reverted back to the<br>original video A/B switch and 4-way splitter setup<br>for a few days. Both front and back projector can<br>be used (incl. HDMI on back projector from either<br>Cogent or a laptop, which requires one cable<br>re-arrange). [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-21T06:18:13-08:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Marty Sereno</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;d86fa35d.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;c3797e83.1501">   <title>Re: scanner problem </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;c3797e83.1501</link>   <description> Front projection is working now, so if you are just using front projection<br>you are fine to scan.<br><br>Atb,<br>Jeannette<br><br>From: Jeannette Bayliss &lt;j.bayliss@ucl.ac.uk&gt;<br>Reply-To: Jeannette Bayliss &lt;j.bayliss@ucl.ac.uk&gt;<br>Date: Tuesday, 20 January 2015 15:22<br>To: &lt;BUCNI@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;<br>Subject: scanner problem<br><br>Dear All,<br><br>The scanner status has changed to \ufffd\ufffddown\ufffd\ufffd. The scanner is actually fine but<br>the matrix switch has developed a fault which means we have to wait for a<br>replacement to arrive. We might revert to a previous setup for front<br>projection in the meantime but at least until tomorrow no scanning\ufffd\ufffd [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-20T16:35:54+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jeannette Bayliss</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;c3797e83.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;7ea096c4.1501">   <title>scanner problem </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;7ea096c4.1501</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>The scanner status has changed to 'down'. The scanner is actually fine but the matrix switch has developed a fault which means we have to wait for a replacement to arrive. We might revert to a previous setup for front projection in the meantime but at least until tomorrow no scanning... [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-20T15:22:24+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bayliss, Jeanette</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;7ea096c4.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;d8fac02d.1501">   <title>No BUCNI presentations this month </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;d8fac02d.1501</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>Since I didn't receive any new project proposals this early in the new<br>year I am cancelling the project presentations for January. The next<br>presentations have been scheduled for:<br><br>11 February @ 3.30<br>11 March @ 3.30<br>08 April @ 3.30<br>20 May @ 3.30<br>01 July @ 3.30<br><br>Best wishes<br>Sam   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-12T14:41:32+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>D Samuel Schwarzkopf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;d8fac02d.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;41cd414a.1501">   <title>Re: BUCNI safety training 13th Jan </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;41cd414a.1501</link>   <description> Hi Jeannette,<br><br>Happy new year to you too! Could I sign up for the safety training (which has moved to the 20th) please?<br><br>Many thanks<br><br>Luke    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-12T12:31:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Palmer, Luke</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;41cd414a.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;61b0636a.1501">   <title>child scanning in February half term? </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;61b0636a.1501</link>   <description> Please could anyone wishing to conduct scans with children during the<br>February half term period come forward, so that we can think about whether<br>we need a special diary or not.<br><br>Many thanks,<br>Jeannette<br><br>To leave the list, go to http://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?SUBED1=bucni&amp;A=1.    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-08T14:07:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jeannette Bayliss</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;61b0636a.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;df8c84ec.1501">   <title>change of date: BUCNI safety training now 20th Jan </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;df8c84ec.1501</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>Unfortunately we have to reschedule next week's training. This session will<br>be moved by one week and will now take place Tuesday 20th January 2015 at<br>10am. Apologies for any inconvenience!<br><br>All the best,<br>Jeannette<br><br>From: Jeannette Bayliss &lt;j.bayliss@ucl.ac.uk&gt;<br>Reply-To: Jeannette Bayliss &lt;j.bayliss@ucl.ac.uk&gt;<br>Date: Tuesday, 6 January 2015 15:24<br>To: &lt;BUCNI@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;<br>Subject: BUCNI safety training 13th Jan<br><br>Hello, and happy new year to you all ! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-06T17:23:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jeannette Bayliss</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;df8c84ec.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;224437d3.1501">   <title>BUCNI safety training 13th Jan </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;224437d3.1501</link>   <description> Hello, and happy new year to you all !<br><br>We have a BUCNI safety session scheduled for Tuesday 13th January at 10am. If you would like to attend this please email me asap.<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Jeannette<br><br>To leave the list, go to http://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?SUBED1=bucni&amp;A=1.    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-06T15:24:33+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bayliss, Jeanette</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;224437d3.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;dedb0daa.1412">   <title>FW: Affective Touch Congress: Call for Papers Extended </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;dedb0daa.1412</link>   <description> [http://client.marketmailer.co.uk/mm_members/61/ftp/Pictures/IASAT_banner.jpg]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-18T05:41:08+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bayliss, Jeanette</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;dedb0daa.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;64203059.1412">   <title>BUCNI presentations, 10th Dec </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;64203059.1412</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>Please join us for this year's last BUCNI project presentations on<br>Wednesday the 10th December at 3pm in the Liz Bates seminar room, 32<br>Torrington Square. There will be two presentations this time:<br><br>Krishnan, Evans, Jasmin &amp; Scott<br>&quot;Listening like a musician: does auditory-motor experience affect<br>perception?&quot;<br><br>Tyrwhitt-Drake, de Haas, Moutsiana &amp;Schwarzkopf<br>&quot;Population receptive field estimates for illusory contour stimuli&quot; [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-05T17:35:20+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>D Sam Schwarzkopf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;64203059.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;56180dd1.1412">   <title>1Z1291400457936422 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;56180dd1.1412</link>   <description> In order for us to be able to complete customs paperwork for the above shipment sent to you from the USA<br><br>Please provide us with your VAT/EORI number as soon as possible<br><br>Please call 08457 877 877 option 4 then 1 and quote the tracking number in the subject field,or reply to this email [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-02T10:13:08+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator><></dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;56180dd1.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;b438d4f9.1412">   <title>BUCNI project presentations, 10th Dec </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;b438d4f9.1412</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>The next BUCNI presentations will be held on the 10th Dec. These will be<br>the last ones this year. For next year I will book fixed dates for at<br>least half a year in advance. Due to room concerns and for balancing out<br>the forces in the universe, we will most likely all the next<br>presentations in Birkbeck. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-01T17:00:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>D Samuel Schwarzkopf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUCNI;b438d4f9.1412</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
